Functions
fza_fnc_bearingClock
Description

Converts a relative bearing to a clock position

Parameters
_degrees

relative bearing

Returns

Clock position for relative bearing

Examples
_clock = [0] call fza_fnc_bearingClock;
//_result => 12

_clock = [90] call fza_fnc_bearingClock;
//_result => 3
Author

mattysmith22
